snippet.title: Loppy: Planet Hopper DEMO Trailer [Next Fest June 2023]
snippet.description:
Wishlist Today:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305100/Loppy_Planet_Hopper/

Made For VoxPop Games Definitive Edition: https://store.voxpopgames.com/store/434

QQNut Games Developer Spotlight: https://www.voxpopgames.net/post/developer-spotlight-qqnut-games

Developer QQnut Games & Publisher by VoxPop Games, Inc. present...

Inspired by old-school platformers, Loppy: Planet Hopper has aliens, bakers, alien bakers! and an evil multi-billion dollar corporation, and also a lot of wackiness!

Three bakers, named Loppy, Evlie, Myah, and a janitor named Studart, who work at the GoGo Bakery in Polaris City, set out on a search for a rare ingredient for a special requested cake, and to stop an evil corporation, Rang Tang INC, from using its powers for pure evil and from conquering every planet known to man (...or alien)!

Follow QQNut Games here:
https://www.youtube.com/@qqnutgames
https://twitter.com/qqnutgames

Follow VoxPop Games here: https://linktr.ee/voxpopgames
